api_list.name: Search a certain word
api_list.description: Returns the word and its definition.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://oxford-dictionary3.p.rapidapi.com/word/comedy"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "oxford-dictionary3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://oxford-dictionary3.p.rapidapi.com/word/{word}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "oxford-dictionary3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get a random word
api_list.description: Returns a  random word with its definition .
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://oxford-dictionary3.p.rapidapi.com/get_word"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "oxford-dictionary3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
